How many people are affected by arrhythmogenic right ventricular cardiomyopathy ?,"ARVC occurs in an estimated 1 in 1,000 to 1 in 1,250 people. This disorder may be underdiagnosed because it can be difficult to detect in people with mild or no symptoms.",GHR,arrhythmogenic right ventricular cardiomyopathy
